Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: Jack0906
Reviews.Content: i’m reading bad reviews planet oc hawaii you’re paying 150 night 500 i’ve staying majestic 30 it’s family run generations i’ve stayed literally dozens oc condos holiday inn they’re little nicer pay privilege spend time else oc beach east coast majestic location super 7th boardwalk you’re inlet noise close action walk purple moose hear live music walk direction meal phillips majestic sit outside deck rocking chair watching people walk i’ve rocked usually collapse awake morning start believe majestic bargain probably bargain boardwalk
